int gcd(int a, int b){ int temp; while(b>0)	{ temp= b; b=a%b; a=temp;}	return a;}
vector<int>adj[5005];
int dp[5005][2]; // 0 include, 1 exclude
void liss(int node)
{
    int include=1,exclude=0,len= adj[node].size(),V;
    for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
    {
        V= adj[node][i];
        liss(V);
        include+=dp[V][1];
        exclude+= max(dp[V][1],dp[V][0]);
    }
    dp[node][0]= include;
    dp[node][1]= exclude;
    return;
}

            while(N--)
            {
                scanf("%d %d",&u,&v);
                adj[v].pb(u);
            }
            liss(0);
            printf("%d\n",max(dp[0][0],dp[0][1]));
      }
return 0;
